sections.heading: health agency; verify competency
sections.text: Each home health agency shall be responsible for verifying in a manner and method prescribed by the department that a home health aide is competent to provide personal care, assistance with the activities of daily living, and basic therapeutic care to patients of the

71-6612.Home health agency; verify competency.

Each home health agency shall be responsible for verifying in a manner and method prescribed by the department that a home health aide is competent to provide personal care, assistance with the activities of daily living, and basic therapeutic care to patients of the agency.

SourceLaws 1988, LB 1100, ยง 127;Laws 1991, LB 703, ยง 62.
